Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
To add a new resource type, click the add wizard in the toolbar (). A dialog pops up, where you can configure the new type.

In a first step, you choose the module, the type should be part of. Therefor, you get a list of the currently installed modules. Select the one, you want to add the resource type to and click "OK".

Next, a dialog is shown where you can configure the type:
